Title: Relates to the hours of operation for family courts
Summary: Relates to the hours of operation for family courts; requires family courts in New York City to remain open until midnight on at least one weekday each week in at least two counties effective January 1, 2023, and in at least three counties, effective January 1, 2024.
LawCode: Amd ยง161, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, in relation to the hours of operation for family courts; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
